verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <WH1732> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh [be] the LORD צוּרִ֗י <WH6697> tzu-Ri, my strength הַֽמְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> ham-lam-Med which teacheth יָדַ֣י <WH3027> ya-Dai my hands לַקְרָ֑ב <WH7128> lak-Rav; to war אֶ֝צְבְּעוֹתַ֗י <WH676> etz-be-'o-Tai, [and] my fingers לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah. to fight

חַסְדִּ֥י <WH2617> chas-Di My goodness וּמְצוּדָתִי֮ <WH4686> u-me-tzu-da-Ti and my fortress מִשְׂגַּבִּ֪י <WH4869> mis-gab-Bi my high tower וּֽמְפַלְטִ֫י <WH6403> u-me-fal-Ti and my deliverer לִ֥י li מָ֭גִנִּי <WH4043> Ma-gin-ni my shield וּב֣וֹ u-Vo חָסִ֑יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti; and [he] in whom I trust הָרוֹדֵ֖ד <WH7286> ha-ro-Ded who subdueth עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> 'am-Mi my people תַחְתָּֽי׃ <WH8478> tach-Tai. under

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God מָה־ <WH4100> mah- what אָ֭דָם <WH120> 'A-dom what [is] man וַתֵּדָעֵ֑הוּ <WH3045> vat-te-da-'E-hu; that thou takest knowledge בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- of him [or] the son אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <WH376> e-Noosh, that וַֽתְּחַשְּׁבֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2803> Vat-te-chash-she-Ve-hu. that thou makest account

אָ֭דָם <WH120> 'A-dom Man לַהֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> la-He-vel to vanity דָּמָ֑ה <WH1819> da-Mah; is like יָ֝מָ֗יו <WH3117> ya-Mav, his days כְּצֵ֣ל <WH6738> ke-Tzel [are] as a shadow עוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> o-Ver. that passeth away

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD הַט־ <WH5186> hat- Bow שָׁמֶ֣יךָ <WH8064> sha-Mei-cha thy heavens וְתֵרֵ֑ד <WH3381> ve-te-Red; and come down גַּ֖ע <WH5060> ga' touch בֶּהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> be-ha-Rim the mountains וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <WH6225> Ve-ye-'e-Sha-nu. and they shall smoke

בְּר֣וֹק <WH1299> be-Rok Cast forth בָּ֭רָק <WH1300> Ba-rok lightning וּתְפִיצֵ֑ם <WH6327> u-te-fi-Tzem; and scatter שְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> she-Lach them shoot out חִ֝צֶּ֗יךָ <WH2671> chitz-Tzei-cha, thine arrows וּתְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <WH2000> u-te-hum-Mem. and destroy

שְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> she-Lach Send יָדֶ֗יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha, thine hand מִמָּ֫ר֥וֹם <WH4791> mi-Ma-Rom from above פְּצֵ֣נִי <WH6475> pe-Tze-ni rid וְ֭הַצִּילֵנִי <WH5337> Ve-hatz-tzi-le-ni me and deliver מִמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> mi-Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; me out of great מִ֝יַּ֗ד <WH3027> mi-Yad, from the hand בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei children נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> ne-Char. of strange

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <WH6310> Pi-hem Whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dib-ber- speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> Shav; vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <WH3225> vi-mi-Nam, and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> ye-Min [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> Sha-ker. of falsehood

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, unto thee O God שִׁ֣יר <WH7891> shir I will sing חָ֭דָשׁ <WH2319> Cha-dosh a new אָשִׁ֣ירָה <WH7892> 'a-Shi-rah song לָּ֑ךְ Lach; בְּנֵ֥בֶל <WH5035> be-Ne-vel upon a psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <WH6218> a-Sor, [and] an instrument of ten strings אֲזַמְּרָה־ <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-rah- will I sing praises לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> han-no-Ten [It is he] that giveth תְּשׁוּעָ֗ה <WH8668> te-shu-'Ah, salvation לַמְּלָ֫כִ֥ים <WH4428> lam-me-La-Chim unto kings הַ֭פּוֹצֶה <WH6475> Hap-po-tzeh who delivereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> da-Vid David עַבְדּ֗וֹ <WH5650> av-Do, his servant מֵחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> me-Che-rev sword רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> ra-'Ah. from the hurtful

פְּצֵ֥נִי <WH6475> pe-Tze-ni Rid וְהַצִּילֵנִי֮ <WH5337> ve-hatz-tzi-le-Ni me and deliver מִיַּ֪ד <WH3027> mi-Yad me from the hand בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- children נֵ֫כָ֥ר <WH5236> ne-Char of strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <WH6310> Pi-hem whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dib-ber- speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> Shav; vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <WH3225> vi-mi-Nam, and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> ye-Min [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> Sha-ker. of falsehood

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Let בָּנֵ֨ינוּ׀ <WH1121> ba-Nei-nu That our sons כִּנְטִעִים֮ <WH5195> kin-ti-'Im [may be] as plants מְגֻדָּלִ֪ים <WH1431> me-gud-da-Lim grown up בִּֽנְעוּרֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH5271> bin-'u-Rei-Hem in their youth בְּנוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <WH1323> be-no-Tei-nu [that] our daughters כְזָוִיֹּ֑ת <WH2106> che-za-vi-Yot; [may be] as corner stones מְ֝חֻטָּב֗וֹת <WH2404> me-chut-ta-Vot, polished תַּבְנִ֥ית <WH8403> tav-Nit [after] the similitude הֵיכָֽל׃ <WH1964> hei-Chal. of a palace

מְזָוֵ֣ינוּ <WH4200> me-za-Vei-nu [That] our garners מְלֵאִים֮ <WH4392> me-le-'Im [may be] full מְפִיקִ֥ים <WH6329> me-fi-Kim affording מִזַּ֗ן <WH2177> miz-Zan, every אֶ֫ל־ <WH413> 'El- about זַ֥ן <WH2177> zan kind צֹאונֵ֣נוּ <WH6629> tzo-Ne-nu [that] our sheep מַ֭אֲלִיפוֹת <WH503> Ma-'a-li-fot may bring forth thousands מְרֻבָּב֗וֹת <WH7231> me-rub-ba-Vot, and ten thousands בְּחוּצוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH2351> be-chu-tzo-Tei-nu. in our streets

אַלּוּפֵ֗ינוּ <WH441> 'al-lu-Fei-nu, [That] our oxen מְֽסֻבָּ֫לִ֥ים <WH5445> me-sub-Ba-Lim [may be] strong to labour אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- Without פֶּ֭רֶץ <WH6556> Pe-retz [that there be] no breaking in וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and without יוֹצֵ֑את <WH3318> yo-Tzet; nor going out וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein no צְ֝וָחָ֗ה <WH6682> tze-va-Chah, that [there be] no complaining בִּרְחֹבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH7339> bir-cho-Tei-nu. in our streets

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> 'ash-Rei Happy הָ֭עָם <WH5971> Ha-'om [is that] people שֶׁכָּ֣כָה <WH3602> shek-Ka-chah that is in such a case לּ֑וֹ lo; אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> 'ash-Rei [yea] happy הָ֝עָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, [is that] people שֶׁיֲהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hav. whose God
